title: Elf
description: Creatures with pointed ears and human-like faces. Female and male elves are available.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the elf emoji presents a playful, enchanting figure with a gentle, light-skinned complexion. Its design features the iconic pointed ears and a vibrant, often green or red, pointed hat, all rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and glossy 3D shading that gives it a delightful, almost tangible quality.  This sprite-like character evokes feelings of wonder, festivity, and a touch of the fantastical, making it ideal for spreading joy during the holidays or any occasion calling for a sprinkle of magic.
